readme:
# Boreal UI Theme
![istantanea_2018-12-07_18-49-21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40722053/49664032-f0dad100-fa50-11e8-8d80-99bea3eeb526.png)

The boreal UI theme is a cool looking, dark blue theme for the Atom editor. It stands out with lighter syntax themes, such as the boreal syntax theme (check it out!) but it looks nice even with dark themes.

# Install
Install the boreal UI theme via Atom by going to Preferences/Settings > Install and search for boreal-ui (search under 'Themes'), or run in your terminal window:
`apm install boreal-ui`

# Feedbacks/Help
If you liked/used this theme please make sure to leave a comment/suggestion to help me improve and update it even more!

If you'd like to collaborate with me, please send an e-mail to nori.filippo@gmail.com. Thank you!
